00051 class NT3D_plot2d_vp_o : public NT3D_plot_vp_o {
00052 public:
00053 /***   Constructors, Copy/Assignment and Destructor  ***/  
00054 NT3D_plot2d_vp_o();
00055 NT3D_plot2d_vp_o(const NT3D_plot2d_vp_o & original);
00056 const NT3D_plot2d_vp_o & operator= (const NT3D_plot2d_vp_o & right);
00057 virtual ~NT3D_plot2d_vp_o();
00058 /* ***  Methods              ***/
00059 void Draw();
00060 void AutoRange (bool decision) { autoRange = decision; }
00061 NTreturn SetXRange(NTreal min, NTreal max){ NT_ASSERT( min < max); xMin = min; xMax = max; return NT_SUCCESS;}
00062 NTreturn SetYRange(NTreal min, NTreal max){ NT_ASSERT( min < max); yMin = min; yMax = max; return NT_SUCCESS;}
00063 /* ***  Data                 ***/  
00064 protected:
00065 /* ***  Methods              ***/
00066 void InitChild() {};
00067 NTreturn ResizeChild(NTsize x, NTsize y){return NT_SUCCESS;}
00068 void RedrawChild(){ DrawCoordinateSystem(); DrawData();}
00069 virtual void DrawData() = 0;
00070 void NewXData(NTreal x){ if (x < dataXMin) dataXMin = x; else if (x > dataXMax) dataXMax = x; }
00071 void NewYData(NTreal y){ if (y < dataYMin) dataYMin = y; else if (y > dataYMax) dataYMax = y; }
00072 /* ***  Data                 ***/
00074 void DrawCoordinateSystem(/* 2DO to be optionalised */);
00075 private:
00076 /* ***  Methods              ***/  
00077 /* ***  Data                 ***/ 
00078 NTreal dataXMin, dataXMax;
00079 NTreal dataYMin, dataYMax;
00080 NTreal xMin, xMax;
00081 NTreal yMin, yMax;
00082 bool autoRange;
00083 bool drawCoord;
00084 };
